title: # 321 - Rhenzy Feliz & ME
description:
It's the premier of Season 2 of The Runaways on Hulu!
Today I sit down with one of the stars of the show, Rhenzy Feliz who plays Alex Wilder. We talk about how he started acting, moving from The Bronx to Florida, his reaction to getting a lead role in The Runaways, making money for the first time, and much more!

Tickets to my “Body Shots” world tour are on sale now!
For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
